seng301.assn4.product

Class ProductFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng301.assn4.product.ProductFacade

  • public class ProductFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls all interaction with all products.
    Author:
    Robert J. Walker

    • Constructor Summary

      Basic constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProductFacade

        public ProductFacade(ProductController... controllers)
        Basic constructor.
        Parameters:
        controllers - Sequence of individual controllers for specific products. A given product kind can be shared between controllers. Controllers are assumed to possess a unique index.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(ProductFacadeListener listener)
        Registers the given listener with this facade so that the listener will be notified of events emanating from here.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to be registered. No effect if it is already registered. Cannot be null.

      • deregister

        public void deregister(ProductFacadeListener listener)
        De-registers the given listener from this facade so that the listener will no longer be notified of events emanating from here.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to be de-registered. No effect if it is not already registered or is null.

      • dispense

        public void dispense(org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.ProductKind kind)
              throws org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.EmptyException,
                     org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.DisabledException,
                     org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.CapacityExceededException
        Dispenses one product from this facade.
        Parameters:
        kind - The kind of the product to dispense. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.DisabledException - If the hardware needed for dispensing is disabled.
        org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.EmptyException - If no products are available.
        org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.CapacityExceededException - If the delivery is impaired by insufficient capacity.

      • load

        public void load(org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.Product... products)
          throws org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.CapacityExceededException
        Loads the sequence of products into this facade. Produces zero or more ":productAdded" events whose total count arguments equal the number of added products.
        Parameters:
        products - The sequence of products to be loaded. Can be empty. None of these can be null.
        Throws:
        org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.hardware.CapacityExceededException - If there is insufficient free space to load all the products.

      • unloadAll

        public java.util.List<org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.Product> unloadAll()
        Removes all the products from this facade. Produces zero or more "productRemoved" events whose total count arguments equal the number of removed products.
        Returns:
        A list of the unloaded products. Cannot be null. Can be empty.

      • unload

        public java.util.List<org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.Product> unload(org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.ProductKind kind)
        Removes all the products of a specified kind from this controller. Produces zero or more "productRemoved" events whose total count arguments equal the number of removed products.
        Parameters:
        kind - The kind of the products to unload. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        A list of the unloaded products. Cannot be null. Can be empty.

      • getController

        public ProductController getController(int index)
        Accesses the controller at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - >= 0 && < the total number of controllers.
        Returns:
        The controller at the specified index.
